framework.core

Class UpdateObject

  • java.lang.Object
    • framework.core.UpdateObject
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Clickable, Collisionable, Updateable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CanvasObject

    public abstract class UpdateObject
extends Object
implements Updateable, Collisionable, Clickable
    The Class UpdateObject is an abstract base-class for objects on the canvas. Collects all important interfaces. Adds possibility to update, check collision and listen to clicks.
    Author:
    Hans

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      UpdateObject()
      Instantiates a new update object.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean checkCollision(Collisionable collisionable)
      Check collision between two collisionables, you have to implement behavior for the checking.
      boolean dispose()
      Disposes the object, means that it won't be updated anymore, the object will be drawn until makeInvisible() is called.
      abstract void onClick(MouseEvent event)
      Is invoked when the object is clicked.
      abstract void onRelease(MouseEvent event)
      Is invoked when the object is released.
      abstract void update(Time time)
      The update-method is called by the application for all updateable instances.

        public boolean checkCollision(Collisionable collisionable)
        Description copied from interface: Collisionable
        Check collision between two collisionables, you have to implement behavior for the checking.
        Specified by:

        Returns:
        true, if successful

      • dispose

        public boolean dispose()
        Disposes the object, means that it won't be updated anymore, the object will be drawn until makeInvisible() is called. After dispose() and makeInvisible() was called the object will be deleted!
        Returns:
        true, if successful disposed

      • update

        public abstract void update(Time time)
        Description copied from interface: Updateable
        The update-method is called by the application for all updateable instances.

        Implement your code for animation here. If you want to check for mouse, key or window events, use the WindowControl, MouseControl and/or KeyboardControl interfaces.

        Specified by:
        update in interface Updateable
        Parameters:
        time - the time
        See Also:
        Application, WindowControl, KeyboardControl, MouseControl
